column4: does ubuntu-moblin-netbook-remix works only on intel atom or it also works on older laps ?
i got a older amilo 512ram, shall i but xubuntu or netbook remix ?
I'd use xubuntu or just plain ubuntu on that machine

in some cases yes, different hardware does different things, ubuntu runs OK on 512mb ram, in fact that is what I use on a virtual machine, whereas you might get a little better performance with xubuntu
